title: funspot logotype
content:
Type expert please help identify the following sans type.

 [‹ PLEASE ID New York Time T Magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705162924/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45415 "Go to previous forum topic") [serif - Americas ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705162924/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45410 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kib820

comments.content:
Their site is currently terribly slow, so I haven’t double checked, but this could be ’Monoline’, by/from The Foundry.

Dav
just checked the foundry, the “t ” doesnt look right.

Edit: It’s not ’Microgramma’/’Eurostile’, nor ’Monoline’. Hmm. My mind is drawing a blank today. Bah.

Dav
